scripts.build: cd ui-library && npm run build && cd ../website && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd ui-library && npm run lint && cd ../website && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd ui-library && npm run lint:fix && cd ../website && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd ui-library && npm run test && cd ../website && npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: cd ui-library && npm run test:coverage && cd ../website && npm run test:coverage
scripts.install:all: cd ui-library && npm install && cd ../website && npm install
